mapper.update:
update public.t_feedback
feedback = #{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feedback_date = #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update public.t_feedback set feedback = #{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, feedback_date = #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
tc.cust_code,tc.wechat_name,tc.wechat_code,tc.mobile,tf.feedback,tf.feedback_date,tf.feedback_id,tc.cust_id from t_feedback tf left join t_customer tc on tf.cust_id = tc.cust_id
order by tf.modify_date DESC

select tc.cust_code,tc.wechat_name,tc.wechat_code,tc.mobile,tf.feedback,tf.feedback_date,tf.feedback_id,tc.cust_id from t_feedback tf left join t_customer tc on tf.cust_id = tc.cust_id
order by tf.modify_date DESC

select tc.cust_code,tc.wechat_name,tc.wechat_code,tc.mobile,tf.feedback,tf.feedback_date,tf.feedback_id,tc.cust_id from t_feedback tf left join t_customer tc on tf.cust_id = tc.cust_id where tf.feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
